        public int compareTo(Shape circle)
        Compares this and another Circle object according to areas.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        circle - takes another triangle as parameter and compares them respect to their areas.
        Returns:
        result of the comparing. If this is greater, then returns 1. if this is less, then returns -1. if they are equal, then returns 0.
